abstract: Blackstone’s interest in Dell seems to raise more questions than it answers. | Joe Nocera says William A. Ackman has an angel on one shoulder and a devil on the other. | In a new special section, DealBook looks at women in finance. | An announcement by Tesla on Monday warrants a close look at how the company presents its numbers.
